title: DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 40 Staff Nurse Pharmacist and Other Posts
description: The District Health Society Ranipet (DHS Ranipet) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 40 Staff Nurses, Lab Technicians, Pharmacists, Health Inspectors, and Multi-Purpose Hospital Workers. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, B.Sc Nursing, Diploma, 12th, GNM, 8th, and D.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, appli...
